mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Chepe Ruíz boxing in San Quentin

mods:mods.mods:note: Photograph of Sleepy Lagoon defendent José "Chepe" Ruíz boxing in San Quentin state prison. Chepe is on the left. Across the photo is written: Your to sweet for words. Best of luck. To Alice, Love Chepe R. The Champ. On verso of photograph is written: Alice this picture was sent to you with my dearest appreciation to you for your sweetness its all I have I hope you like it. Love, Chepe Grandmama your sweet

mods:mods.mods:note: Publication of the Center Theater Group. Includes official program of the play; an essay on the genesis of the play by Valdez; an introduction to the Mark Taper Forum and the play by Davidson, Taper artistic director; an essay on "El Pachuco" by Torres; as well as information on the Sleepy Lagoon Trial

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Chepe Ruíz boxing in San Quentin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Sleepy Lagoon defendent José "Chepe" Ruíz boxing in San Quentin state prison. Chepe is on the left. Across the photo is written: Your to sweet for words. Best of luck. To Alice, Love Chepe R. The Champ. On verso of photograph is written: Alice this picture was sent to you with my dearest appreciation to you for your sweetness its all I have I hope you like it. Love, Chepe Grandmama your sweet
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Prisoners--California
California State Prison at San Quentin

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Performing arts : Zoot Suit
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center Theater Group of Los Angeles
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Publication of the Center Theater Group. Includes official program of the play; an essay on the genesis of the play by Valdez; an introduction to the Mark Taper Forum and the play by Davidson, Taper artistic director; an essay on "El Pachuco" by Torres; as well as information on the Sleepy Lagoon Trial
